summary: Automatically harvest nearby ingredients for alchemy
descriptionHtml:
Auto Harvest
v. 0.1.3 (Beta)


BE SURE TO STOP / START HARVESTING AFTER UPDATES!  Otherwise your variables won\'t reset properly.

ALSO! STOP / START Harvesting after 5 Alchemy skill-ups (give or take).  The timer WILL NOT UPDATE ON ITS OWN! (10 skill points will reduce the time between events by 0.8 seconds).


PLEASE READ!

This mod is currently in Beta.  What does that mean?

1. Basic functionality is working. Testing has been successful, but new stuff might still need more.
2. The mod is meant to change quite a bit in the near future.


-----------------------
HOW TO USE
-----------------------

Go to Dragonsreach and enter the palace, and head for the court-wizard\'s area. 
Look for a book laying on his desk (the part that runs parallel to the map) titled Auto Harvest Alpha and pick it up and read it.
Select your new spell in the Powers section.  Cast it with your Shout/Powers button (default Z).
Walk around and enjoy.


-----------------------
WHAT IT DOES
-----------------------

This mod will harvest one herb every 10 - (8 * AlchemySkillPercent) seconds within a certain radius.  If your alchemy is 0, it\'ll harvest every 10 seconds.  If your alchemy is 50 and the max is 100, it will harvest every 6 seconds.  If your alchemy is 100 and the max is 100, it will harvest every 2 seconds.

It will target a random herb.  If it cannot be picked, it will try another random herb two more times.  If it succeeds in one of the three times, is stops trying.  If it fails all three, it will wait until the next tick.


-----------------------
WHAT IS COMING
-----------------------

I was thinking about having a spell that opens an inventory.  In that inventory, you can place an herb (or herbs) that you picked yourself.  The Auto Harvester will then harvest only these herbs, there by forcing the player to gather ingredients at least once before going auto.  It will also allow you to specify which plants you want to pick


-----------------------
CURRENT ISSUES
-----------------------

None so far in Alpha.  Beta needs more testing.


NOTE!  This DOES harvest things such as Bees, Dragonflies, Beehives, Fish (not Salmon), Nirnroot, Scarlet Nirnroot.
This DOES NOT harvest food.


-----------------------
THANKS
-----------------------
lee.coplin (steam) -	Faction owner bug report.
						Thanks, lee.  BTW, I have not been ignoring you.  Every time I try to respond in the mod\'s discussion, it gives me an error.  Called method is busy.  I am NOT ignoring you.

nexus community -  You guys are the reason I came back to this.

-----------------------
CHANGELOG
-----------------------
PLEASE CLICK THE VERSION AT THE TOP TO SEE THE CHANGELOG!
author: LaoArchAngel

files.name: AutoHarvest 0_0_2
files.changelogHtml:
Fix: Now check wether the object has a faction owner as well. If either is not null, we don\'t pick.Bug fix:
Change: We now select a random nearby ingredient, not just the nearest. Should allow for more diverse pickings.

files.name: AutoHarvest 0_0_3
files.changelogHtml: Fix: Now we check the object\'s Actor owner, Faction owner, as well as the cell\'s actor owner and faction owner. If any of these is not null, do not activate. This should fix the stealing problem. Tested in inns and around Whiterun\'s entrance.

files.name: AutoHarvest 0_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Harvest time now modified by Alchemy skill.
Attempts to harvest 3 times before failing and waiting for next event.

files.name: AutoHarvest 0_1_1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a bug where the harvester would attempt to harvest the same ingredient 3 times instead of trying to find a new one each time.

files.name: AutoHarvest 0_1_2
files.changelogHtml: Fixed the bug where the AutoHarvest power would do nothing.

files.name: AutoHarvest 0_1_3
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a bug that set the timer to 2 seconds, regardless of skill.
